DOC.brief_summary: This single center , prospective , non-randomized , uncontrolled , observational study use enteral nutrition product pediatric patient developmental disability .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective observational study seek assess ability achieve enteral feeding goal new tube feed product pediatric patient developmental disability .
DOC.criteria: Child age 113 year old development disability Currently tolerate enteral feed Requiring nutritional management meet 5090th % weight age Kennedy Kreiger Growth Charts Requires enteral tube feed least 14 day . Unable access gastrointestinal tract feed via tube Other condition contraindicates tube feed
